text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the MSI GL Series GL75 9SDK-063 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the MSI GL Series GL75 9SDK-063 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

The MSI GL Series GL75 9SDK-063 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
